translations.text: By the fig and the olive<sup foot_note=197782>1</sup>
We have certainly created man in the best of stature;<sup foot_note=197783>1</sup>
Then We return him to the lowest of the low,<sup foot_note=197784>1</sup>
Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?<sup foot_note=197785>1</sup>
Is not AllƒÅh the most just of judges?
